Desc.eng: This little man must have died from exhaustion. Who was he?

These handwritten notes might help. Listen: "I failed to persuade the scientists that I'm a simple cook, not a miner... they told me to stop lying... that "my kind" always sings about gold and we are good miners..."
Did they think he was a dwarf? Dwarves don't exist. Stupid scientists.
Wait, it goes on. "They left me here. I'm weak and I could only chisel down a couple of splinters from this rock. They haven't returned. I can't leave because of the kobolds."
Poor thing! He was only a small man. But this rock could really contain rare minerals. You should try and dig up some.
